title: Roar!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>It was fun to come up with these costumes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m happy that we’re matching.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan likes to think about what she’d like to wear, but it’s even better to think about what would look good on Rina-chan since it reminds me of how good friends we are. Kanata-chan loves that feeling~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Me too. I think you should put on bear ears, Kanata-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan should become a teddy bear?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You should roar like a bear.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I’m gonna eat you~ Roar~! Like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s cute. I love it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You should put on these cat ears, Rina-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Nyan, nyan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
